document_data.name: Thaumsimbel Thardresk
document_data.mainbody: '''Thausimbel Thardresk''', known as '''"the Wise"''', '''"the Greybeard"''' and '''"The Long- Lived"''', was the greatest king of [[Anauria]], one of the three [[Lost Kingdoms]] that survived ancient [[Netheril]].
document_data.Activities: While he a member of the royal human lineage of [[House Thardresk]], King Thausimbel did have some [[elven]] ancestry, which allowed him to rule Anauria for for 366 years. During that time he forged durable alliances with [[elves]],the [[dwarves]] of [[Oghrann]], as well as the humans that lived in the region that later came to be known as [[Dragon Reach]].
document_data.Abilities: Thausimbel was also skilled in swordcraft and the appraising of gems.
document_data.Relationships: He had one known heir who went on to rule the kingdom herself, Queen [[Shaddara|Shaddara the Fair]].
document_data.History: After his death, it was said King Thausimbel was interred beneath a temple of [[Jergal]]. In truth the depths of the temple held a ''[[portal]]'' that was linked to the [[Dungeon of Swords]] in the mounds later known as the [[Serpent Hills]].
